name: politico
text:
Biden was just about the last Democrat progressives wanted as the nominee.

But now that he‚Äôs the one taking on Trump, they‚Äôre working harder to put him in office than they did for Hillary Clinton ‚Äî and they're planning to give him hell the minute he wins https://t.co/TE9Ezyl0Xv

text:

name: politico
text: The Democratic National Convention has a distinctly different feel this year, with the #Covid pandemic pushing it to a virtual affair that lacks raucous crowds, behind-the-scenes dealmaking and the general pizzazz of a political celebration https://t.co/dPmuKoV4px

name: politico
text:
The opening night featured a moment of silence for George Floyd, the Black man killed by Minneapolis police in May.

Floyd's brother commended the protests against racial injustice as a fitting tribute and listed the names of others killed by police https://t.co/dPmuKoV4px

text:
Some of the strongest moments tonight weren‚Äôt speeches by politicians, says @lbarronlopez. "The memoriam of lives lost to Covid and Biden‚Äôs history of riding Amtrak and the people he spoke to along the way ‚Äì those to me were the most striking"

name: politico
text:
Despite the personal attacks that have streamed from the Trump White House, former first lady Michelle Obama is sticking by her mantra of going high when others go low:

‚ÄúGoing high is the only thing that works,‚Äù she said during the #DNCConvention¬† https://t.co/YqxPpRtZgy https://t.co/YQK2H2XwoD

name: politico
text:
Former Ohio Gov. John Kasich stood at a literal crossroads as he talked about his choice to vote for Joe Biden. ‚ÄúI'm a lifelong Republican, but that attachment holds second place to my responsibility to my country,‚Äù he said.

#DemConvention key moments: https://t.co/FNYJjoOjM9 https://t.co/iYxX9WLqo2

name: politico
text:
Nevada Sen. Catherine Cortez Masto called out Trump for attacking mail-in voting, pointing out how he himself has requested absentee ballots twice this year. ‚ÄúTrump is trying to divide us by undermining that right,‚Äù she said.

More DNC key moments: https://t.co/FNYJjoOjM9 https://t.co/ZggSWGZL23

name: politico
text:
‚ÄúMost cops are good,‚Äù Biden said during a DNC panel on police violence. ‚ÄúThe fact is that the bad ones have to be identified, prosecuted and out, period.‚Äù

text:

text:
